summary: Ja'wa is a follower inspired by jawas from Star Wars. He has many functions. Ja'wa live in lodge near the Sunderstone Gorge.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]Ja'wa is a follower inspired by jawas from Star Wars. He has many functions. Ja'wa live in lodge near the Sunderstone Gorge.[/size]

[url=https://www.patreon.com/haemprojects][size=2][img]http://tesall.ru/uploads/imgs/pre_1535556014__11111.png[/img][/size][size=5]﻿[b]Support Haem Projects on Patreon![/b][/size][/url]﻿

[size=3][b]Features:[/b][/size]
[size=2]- Ja'wa has the unique follower system;[/size]
[size=2]- Ja'wa has unique voice reactions;[/size]
[size=2]- Ja'wa will never get lost;[/size]
[size=2]- Ja'wa is brainy;[/size]
[size=2]- Ja'wa is cute.
[/size]
[b][size=3]Requirements: [/size][/b]
[size=2]All DLC 
[/size]
[b][size=3]How to start:[/size][/b]
[size=2]Ja'wa live in lodge near the Sunderstone Gorge. Look for map marker when you start game. 
[/size]
[size=3][b]Uninstall: [/b][/size]
[size=2]Before uninstalling mod unfollow Ja'wa.

[center][youtube]PoPFxCwZMDI[/youtube][/center][center]﻿[/center][center][youtube]d3rIdXpBWfQ[/youtube][/center]
[/size]
[b][size=3]Third Party Content:[/size][/b]
[size=2]We used Jawa Junkyard on http://www.starwars.com for create Ja'wa's voice assets.
3d model by [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/2178703-kiriavark/]Kiriav[/url]. https://kiriav.tumblr.com
[/size]
[b][size=3]Created by: [/size][/b]
[size=2][url=https://haemprojects.com]Haem Projects[/url] (Dimonoider & gkalian)
[/size]
[size=3][b]Contact Us:[/b][/size]
